<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-form ref="form" @submit.prevent="submitForm">
      <v-text-field
        v-model="formData.title"
        label="Title"
        required
      ></v-text-field>

      <v-textarea
        v-model="formData.questionText"
        label="Question"
        required
      ></v-textarea>

      <v-file-input
        v-model="formData.qImage"
        label="Upload Image"
        accept="image/*"
        @change="previewImage"
      ></v-file-input>

      <v-img v-if="previewImageSrc" :src="previewImageSrc" max-width="200"></v-img>

      <v-btn color="primary" type="submit">Submit</v-btn>
    </v-form>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      formData: {
        title: '',
        questionText: '',
        qImage: null,
      },
      previewImageSrc: null,
    };
  },
  methods: {
    previewImage() {
      if (this.formData.qImage) {
        const reader = new FileReader();
        reader.onload = (e) => {
          this.previewImageSrc = e.target.result;
        };
        reader.readAsDataURL(this.formData.qImage);
      } else {
        this.previewImageSrc = null;
      }
    },
    async submitForm() {
      const formData = new FormData();
      formData.append('title', this.formData.title);
      formData.append('questionText', this.formData.questionText);
      if (this.formData.qImage) {
        formData.append('image', this.formData.qImage);
      }

      try {
        const response = await axios.post('/qna/create', formData, {
          headers: {
            'Content-Type': 'multipart/form-data',
          },
        });
        console.log(response.data);
        alert('Question created successfully!');
        this.resetForm();
      } catch (error) {
        const errorMessage = error.response && error.response.data ? error.response.data.message : 'Failed to create question';
        alert(errorMessage);
        console.error(error);
      }
    },
    resetForm() {
      this.formData.title = '';
      this.formData.questionText = '';
      this.formData.qImage = null;
      this.previewImageSrc = null;
      this.$refs.form.reset();
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-container {
  max-width: 600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding-top: 50px;
}
</style>
